Welcome to the Training Planner, which draws together all in-house training available to teaching and support staff in Brighton & Hove's schools.
This information complements the Children, Families and Schoolsâ training and development course information Brochure already
in schools (sent via your staff development co-ordinator).
This site enables you to search by date course title and provider. There are three providers the main one being the School
Adviser/Consultant team who deliver the vast majority of training development for school staff including Teaching Assistants
and support staff. Additionally ICT and Governors provide training which is relevant to school based staff.
Applications for courses should be made on Application Form TR/5 (a hard copy is available in the school
Training & Development Brochure or you can save the form electronically from this site) quoting the course code and title and
then sent via post fax or e-mailed to the relevant team as found on the course flyer. Donât forget you need authorisation from
your Headteacher before you send your application. If sending via e-mail please confirm, you have your headteachers permission
to attend. The closing date* for applications is three weeks (15 working days) prior to the course start date.
